thread.section_title: Yaniv & Associates, PC Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Yaniv & Associates, PC | uncontesteddivorceny.com
thread.title: Adam Lux
thread.title_full: Yaniv & Associates, PC reviewed by Adam Lux

author: Adam Lux
title: Adam Lux
text:
Everything I was promised was delivered on time.
There wasn't any BS.
I was extremely nervous and stressed out about the prospect of getting divorced but Yaniv and Associates made, what could have been an otherwise stressful process, extremely ok.
Best value for money of all the law firms in NYC!
